text: [Music]
my name is simon i'm a delivery practice
manager here in switzerland that means
that i'm leading a team of technical
consultants that specialize on emerging
technologies like machine learning and
iot
my role has a couple of different
components one part of it is to manage
the team that means helping them with
promotions and helping them to find
interesting projects and delivering
coaching
the other part is a customer facing part
which is working with clients
understanding their problems and making
sure that i find the right consultants
to solve their problems
the very core purpose of what we do is
to help them modernize and innovate
their business we would set up machine
learning solutions where we're analyzing
satellite photos
or we are programming algorithms that
help formula one teams to optimize the
performance
the biggest surprise when joining aws
was the culture what i was really amazed
to see
was the level of collaboration
how when we enter a customer meeting or
when we're working with a project
it's people joining from all over the
company working together as one in order
to deliver the highest results and i'm
really enjoying that
here in switzerland there is a lot of
technical companies and multinational
corporations
and we are helping them to modernize
their business and innovate their
business discussing where they would
like to be in five or ten years time and
then setting up strategies and helping
them to build a tech to get there
diversity and inclusion is a big
priority for the company and i'm so
happily surprised when joining here in
switzerland that i came to a team that's
highly diverse and that really helps us
to establish
a good working environment
[Music]
